# Lox - Java Implementation

This directory contains the Java implementation of the Lox interpreter from the book *Crafting Interpreters*.

A Makefile is included to simplify compilation and execution.

## How to Run lox

### Compile:
`make`

### Run the interpreter:
`make run`

### Run a `.lox` file:
`make run-args ARGS="path/to/script.lox"`

### Clean generated files:
`make clean`
